sentence.Network_en: The wind sent sparks and cinders flying.
This material is variously termed ash, clinker, cinders or slag.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种材料有不同的名称,如灰 、 炉渣 、 煤渣或矿渣.

sentence.Network_en: Rake out the cinders before you start a new fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 在重新点火前先把煤渣耙出来.

list.abs: 火山渣锥-火山渣锥(Cinder cone)是指火山口周围由火成岩屑或火山渣等火山的喷出物质堆积而成的山丘。大多数的火山渣锥都很耐侵蚀,因为落到锥上的降雨渗入到高渗水.

entry.def: Cinders are the black pieces that are left after something such as wood or coal has burned away.

example.ex: The wind sent sparks and cinders flying.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But even Cinders, it transpired, had her moral standards.
